mapper.sql: storehouse_id AS "storeHouseId", instock_list_id AS "instockListId", brand_id AS "brandId", item_id AS "itemId", number AS "number", instock_order_id AS "instockOrderId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_instock_list where 1 = 1
and instock_list_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockListId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and instock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockOrderId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
